00075 BOOLEAN HandleBeginFadeIn( UINT32 uiScreenExit )
00076 {
00077       if ( gfFadeIn )
00078       {
00079             BeginFade( uiScreenExit, 35, FADE_IN_REALFADE, 5 );
00080 
00081             gfFadeIn = FALSE;
00082 
00083             gfFadeInDone = TRUE;
00084 
00085             return( TRUE );
00086       }
00087 
00088       return( FALSE );
00089 }
00090 
00091 BOOLEAN HandleBeginFadeOut( UINT32 uiScreenExit )
00092 {

00094       {
00095             BeginFade( uiScreenExit, 35, FADE_OUT_REALFADE, 5 );
00096 
00097             gfFadeOut = FALSE;
00098 
00099             gfFadeOutDone = TRUE;
00100 
00101             return( TRUE );
00102       }
00103 
00104       return( FALSE );

00108 BOOLEAN HandleFadeOutCallback( )
00109 {
00110       if ( gfFadeOutDone )
00111       {
00112             gfFadeOutDone = FALSE;
00113 
00114             if ( gFadeOutDoneCallback != NULL )
00115             {
00116                   gFadeOutDoneCallback( );
00117 
00118                   gFadeOutDoneCallback = NULL;
00119 
00120                   return( TRUE );
00121             }
00122       }
00123 
00124       return( FALSE );
00125 }

00148 void BeginFade( UINT32 uiExitScreen, INT8 bFadeValue, INT8 bType, UINT32 uiDelay )
00149 {
00150       //Init some paramters
00151       guiExitScreen     = uiExitScreen;
00152       gbFadeValue       = bFadeValue;
00153       guiFadeDelay                  = uiDelay;
00154       gfFadeIn = FALSE;
00155       gfFadeInVideo = TRUE;
00156 
00157       uiOldMusicMode = uiMusicHandle;
00158 
00159 
00160       // Calculate step;
00161       switch ( bType )
00162       {
00163                   case FADE_IN_REALFADE:
00164 
00165                         gsFadeRealCount = -1;
00166                         gsFadeLimit             = 8;
00167                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeInFrameBufferRealFade;         
00168                         gfFadeInVideo   = FALSE;
00169 
00170                         // Copy backbuffer to savebuffer
00171                         UpdateSaveBufferWithBackbuffer( );
00172 
00173                         // Clear framebuffer
00174                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00175                         break;
00176 
00177                   case FADE_OUT_REALFADE:
00178                         
00179                         gsFadeRealCount = -1;
00180                         gsFadeLimit             = 10;
00181                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeFrameBufferRealFade;           
00182                         gfFadeInVideo   = FALSE;
00183 
00184                         // Clear framebuffer
00185                         //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00186                         break;
00187 
00188                   case FADE_OUT_VERSION_ONE:
00189                         //gsFadeLimit = 255 / bFadeValue;
00190                         //gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeFrameBufferVersionOne;
00191                         //SetMusicFadeSpeed( 25 );
00192                         //SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00193                         break;
00194 
00195                   case FADE_OUT_SQUARE:
00196                         gsFadeLimit = (SCREEN_WIDTH / ( SQUARE_STEP * 2 ) );
00197                         giX1 = 0;
00198                         giX2 = SCREEN_WIDTH;
00199                         giY1 = 0;
00200                         giY2 = SCREEN_HEIGHT;
00201                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeFrameBufferSquare;
00202 
00203                         // Zero frame buffer
00204                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00205                         //ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00206 
00207                   //    SetMusicFadeSpeed( 25 );
00208                         //SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00209                         break;
00210 
00211                   case FADE_IN_VERSION_ONE:
00212                         gsFadeLimit = 255 / bFadeValue;
00213                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeInBackBufferVersionOne;
00214                         break;
00215 
00216                   case FADE_IN_SQUARE:
00217                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeInBackBufferSquare;
00218                         giX1 = SCREEN_WIDTH/2;
00219                         giX2 = SCREEN_WIDTH/2;
00220                         giY1 = SCREEN_HEIGHT/2;
00221                         giY2 = SCREEN_HEIGHT/2;
00222                         gsFadeLimit = (SCREEN_WIDTH / ( SQUARE_STEP * 2 ) );
00223                         gfFadeIn = TRUE;
00224                         break;
00225 
00226                   case FADE_OUT_VERSION_FASTER:
00227                         gsFadeLimit = (255 / bFadeValue) * 2;
00228                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeFrameBufferVersionFaster;
00229 
00230                         //SetMusicFadeSpeed( 25 );
00231                         //SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00232                         break;
00233 
00234                   case FADE_OUT_VERSION_SIDE:
00235                         // Copy frame buffer to save buffer
00236                         gsFadeLimit = (SCREEN_WIDTH / 8 );
00237                         gFadeFunction = (FADE_FUNCTION)FadeFrameBufferSide;
00238 
00239                         //SetMusicFadeSpeed( 25 );
00240                         //SetMusicMode( MUSIC_NONE );
00241                         break;
00242 
00243       }
00244 
00245       gfFadeInitialized = TRUE;
00246       gfFirstTimeInFade = TRUE;
00247       gsFadeCount                   = 0;
00248       gbFadeType                                = bType;
00249 
00250       SetPendingNewScreen(FADE_SCREEN);
00251 
00252 }

00255 UINT32      FadeScreenInit( )

00260 
00261 UINT32      FadeScreenHandle( )
00262 {
00263       UINT32 uiTime;
00264 
00265       if ( !gfFadeInitialized )
00266       {
00267             SET_ERROR( "Fade Screen called but not intialized " );
00268             return( ERROR_SCREEN );
00269       }
00270 
00271       // ATE: Remove cursor
00272       SetCurrentCursorFromDatabase( VIDEO_NO_CURSOR );
00273 
00274 
00275       if ( gfFirstTimeInFade )
00276       {
00277             gfFirstTimeInFade = FALSE;
00278 
00279             // Calcuate delay
00280             guiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00281       }
00282 
00283       // Get time
00284       uiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00285 
00286       MusicPoll( TRUE );
00287 
00288       if ( ( uiTime - guiTime ) > guiFadeDelay )
00289       {
00290             // Fade!
00291             if ( !gfFadeIn )
00292             {
00293                   //gFadeFunction( );
00294             }
00295 
00296             InvalidateScreen();
00297 
00298             if ( !gfFadeInVideo )
00299             {
00300                   gFadeFunction( );
00301             }
00302 
00303             gsFadeCount++;
00304 
00305             if ( gsFadeCount > gsFadeLimit )
00306             {
00307                   switch( gbFadeType )
00308                   {
00309                         case FADE_OUT_REALFADE:
00310 
00311                               // Clear framebuffer
00312                               ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00313                               break;
00314                   }
00315 
00316                   //End!
00317                   gfFadeInitialized = FALSE;
00318                   gfFadeIn = FALSE;
00319 
00320                   return( guiExitScreen );
00321             }
00322       }
00323 
00324       return( FADE_SCREEN );
00325 }

00334 void FadeFrameBufferVersionOne( )
00335 {
00336       INT32       cX, cY;
00337       UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES;
00338       UINT16      *pBuf;
00339       INT16       bR, bG, bB;
00340       UINT32      uiRGBColor;
00341       UINT16            s16BPPSrc;
00342 
00343 
00344       pBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00345 
00346       // LOCK FRAME BUFFER
00347       for ( cX = 0; cX < SCREEN_WIDTH; cX++ )
00348       {
00349             for ( cY = 0; cY < SCREEN_HEIGHT; cY++ )
00350             {
00351                   s16BPPSrc = pBuf[ ( cY * 640 ) + cX ];
00352 
00353                   uiRGBColor = GetRGBColor( s16BPPSrc );
00354 
00355                   bR = SGPGetRValue( uiRGBColor );
00356                   bG = SGPGetGValue( uiRGBColor );
00357                   bB = SGPGetBValue( uiRGBColor );
00358 
00359                   // Fade down
00360                   bR -= gbFadeValue;
00361                   if ( bR < 0 )
00362                         bR = 0;
00363 
00364                   bG -= gbFadeValue;
00365                   if ( bG < 0 )
00366                         bG = 0;
00367 
00368                   bB -= gbFadeValue;
00369                   if ( bB < 0 )
00370                         bB = 0;
00371 
00372                   // Set back info buffer
00373                   pBuf[ ( cY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + cX ] = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( bR, bG, bB ) );
00374 
00375             }
00376       }
00377 
00378       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00379 
00380 }
00381 
00382 void FadeInBackBufferVersionOne( )
00383 {
00384       INT32       cX, cY;
00385       UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00386       UINT16      *pSrcBuf, *pDestBuf;
00387       INT16       bR, bG, bB;
00388       UINT32      uiRGBColor;
00389       UINT16            s16BPPSrc;
00390       INT16       bFadeVal = ( gsFadeLimit - gsFadeCount ) * gbFadeValue;
00391 
00392       pDestBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(BACKBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00393       pSrcBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00394 
00395       // LOCK FRAME BUFFER
00396       for ( cX = 0; cX < SCREEN_WIDTH; cX++ )
00397       {
00398             for ( cY = 0; cY < SCREEN_HEIGHT; cY++ )
00399             {
00400                   s16BPPSrc = pSrcBuf[ ( cY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + cX ];
00401 
00402                   uiRGBColor = GetRGBColor( s16BPPSrc );
00403 
00404                   bR = SGPGetRValue( uiRGBColor );
00405                   bG = SGPGetGValue( uiRGBColor );
00406                   bB = SGPGetBValue( uiRGBColor );
00407 
00408                   // Fade down
00409                   bR -= bFadeVal;
00410                   if ( bR < 0 )
00411                         bR = 0;
00412 
00413                   bG -= bFadeVal;
00414                   if ( bG < 0 )
00415                         bG = 0;
00416 
00417                   bB -= bFadeVal;
00418                   if ( bB < 0 )
00419                         bB = 0;
00420 
00421                   // Set back info dest buffer
00422                   pDestBuf[ ( cY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + cX ] = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( bR, bG, bB ) );
00423 
00424             }
00425       }
00426 
00427       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00428       UnLockVideoSurface(BACKBUFFER);
00429 
00430 }

00433 void FadeFrameBufferVersionFaster( INT8 bFadeValue )
00434 {
00435       INT32       cX, cY, iStartX, iStartY;
00436       UINT32      uiDestPitchBYTES;
00437       UINT16      *pBuf;
00438       INT16       bR, bG, bB;
00439       UINT32      uiRGBColor;
00440       UINT16            s16BPPSrc;
00441 
00442 
00443       pBuf = (UINT16*)LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00444 
00445       iStartX = gsFadeCount % 2;
00446       iStartY = 0;
00447 
00448       // LOCK FRAME BUFFER
00449       for ( cX = iStartX; cX < SCREEN_WIDTH; cX+= 2 )
00450       {
00451             if ( iStartX == 1 )
00452             {
00453                   iStartX = 0;
00454             }
00455             else
00456             {
00457                   iStartX = 1;
00458             }
00459 
00460             for ( cY = iStartY; cY < SCREEN_HEIGHT; cY++ )
00461             {
00462                   s16BPPSrc = pBuf[ ( cY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + cX ];
00463 
00464                   uiRGBColor = GetRGBColor( s16BPPSrc );
00465 
00466                   bR = SGPGetRValue( uiRGBColor );
00467                   bG = SGPGetGValue( uiRGBColor );
00468                   bB = SGPGetBValue( uiRGBColor );
00469 
00470                   // Fade down
00471                   bR -= bFadeValue;
00472                   if ( bR < 0 )
00473                         bR = 0;
00474 
00475                   bG -= bFadeValue;
00476                   if ( bG < 0 )
00477                         bG = 0;
00478 
00479                   bB -= bFadeValue;
00480                   if ( bB < 0 )
00481                         bB = 0;
00482 
00483                   // Set back info buffer
00484                   pBuf[ ( cY * SCREEN_WIDTH ) + cX ] = Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( bR, bG, bB ) );
00485 
00486             }
00487       }
00488 
00489       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00490 
00491 }

00493 
00494 void FadeFrameBufferSide(  )
00495 {
00496       INT32 iX1, iX2;
00497       INT16 sFadeMove;
00498 
00499       sFadeMove = gsFadeCount * 4;
00500 
00501       iX1 = 0;
00502       iX2 = sFadeMove;
00503 
00504       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, iX1, 0, iX2, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00505 
00506       iX1 = 640 - sFadeMove;
00507       iX2 = 640;
00508 
00509       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, iX1, 0, iX2, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00510 
00511 }
00512 
00513 void FadeFrameBufferSquare(  )
00514 {
00515       INT32 iX1, iX2, iY1, iY2;
00516       INT16 sFadeXMove, sFadeYMove;
00517 
00518       sFadeXMove = SQUARE_STEP;
00519       sFadeYMove = (INT16)(sFadeXMove * .75);
00520 
00521       
00522       iX1 = giX1;
00523       iX2 = giX1 + sFadeXMove;
00524       iY1 = giY1;
00525       iY2 = giY1 + sFadeYMove;
00526 
00527       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( BACKBUFFER, iX1, 0, iX2, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00528       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( BACKBUFFER, 0, iY1, SCREEN_WIDTH, iY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00529 
00530       iX1 = giX2 - sFadeXMove;
00531       iX2 = giX2;
00532       iY1 = giY2 - sFadeYMove;
00533       iY2 = giY2;
00534 
00535       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( BACKBUFFER, iX1, 0, iX2, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00536       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( BACKBUFFER, 0, iY1, SCREEN_WIDTH, iY2, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00537 
00538       giX1 += sFadeXMove;
00539       giX2 -= sFadeXMove;
00540       giY1 += sFadeYMove;
00541       giY2 -= sFadeYMove;
00542 
00543 }

00546 void FadeInBackBufferSquare(  )
00547 {
00548       INT32 iX1, iX2, iY1, iY2;
00549       INT16 sFadeXMove, sFadeYMove;
00550       blt_vs_fx BltFx;
00551 
00552       sFadeXMove = SQUARE_STEP;
00553       sFadeYMove = (INT16)(sFadeXMove * .75);
00554 
00555       if ( gsFadeCount == 0 )
00556       {
00557             ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( BACKBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
00558       }
00559 
00560       iX1 = giX1 - sFadeXMove;
00561       iX2 = giX1;
00562       iY1 = giY1 - sFadeYMove;
00563       iY2 = giY2 + sFadeYMove;
00564 
00565       BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft = iX1;
00566       BltFx.SrcRect.iTop  = iY1;
00567       BltFx.SrcRect.iRight = iX2;
00568       BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom = iY2;
00569 
00570       if ( BltFx.SrcRect.iRight != BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft  )
00571       {
00572             BltVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 
00573                                                                                                        iX1, iY1, 
00574                                                                                                        VS_BLT_SRCSUBRECT, &BltFx );
00575       }
00576 
00577       iX1 = giX2;
00578       iX2 = giX2 + sFadeXMove;
00579       iY1 = giY1 - sFadeYMove;
00580       iY2 = giY2 + sFadeYMove;
00581 
00582       BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft = iX1;
00583       BltFx.SrcRect.iTop  = iY1;
00584       BltFx.SrcRect.iRight = iX2;
00585       BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom = iY2;
00586 
00587       if ( BltFx.SrcRect.iRight != BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft )
00588       {
00589             BltVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 
00590                                                                                                        iX1, iY1, 
00591                                                                                                        VS_BLT_SRCSUBRECT, &BltFx );
00592       }
00593 
00594       iX1 = giX1;
00595       iX2 = giX2;
00596       iY1 = giY1 - sFadeYMove;
00597       iY2 = giY1;
00598 
00599       BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft = iX1;
00600       BltFx.SrcRect.iTop  = iY1;
00601       BltFx.SrcRect.iRight = iX2;
00602       BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom = iY2;
00603 
00604       if (  BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom != BltFx.SrcRect.iTop )
00605       {
00606             BltVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 
00607                                                                                                        iX1, iY1, 
00608                                                                                                        VS_BLT_SRCSUBRECT, &BltFx );
00609       }
00610 
00611       iX1 = giX1;
00612       iX2 = giX2;
00613       iY1 = giY2;
00614       iY2 = giY2 + sFadeYMove;
00615 
00616       BltFx.SrcRect.iLeft = iX1;
00617       BltFx.SrcRect.iTop  = iY1;
00618       BltFx.SrcRect.iRight = iX2;
00619       BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom = iY2;
00620 
00621       if ( BltFx.SrcRect.iBottom != BltFx.SrcRect.iTop )
00622       {
00623             BltVideoSurface( BACKBUFFER, FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 
00624                                                                                                        iX1, iY1, 
00625                                                                                                        VS_BLT_SRCSUBRECT, &BltFx );
00626       }
00627 
00628       giX1 -= sFadeXMove;
00629       giX2 += sFadeXMove;
00630       giY1 -= sFadeYMove;
00631       giY2 += sFadeYMove;
00632 
00633 }

00636 void FadeFrameBufferRealFade( )
00637 {
00638       if ( gsFadeRealCount != gsFadeCount )
00639       {
00640             ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );        
00641 
00642             gsFadeRealCount = gsFadeCount;
00643       }
00644 
00645 }
00646 
00647 
00648 void FadeInFrameBufferRealFade( )
00649 {
00650       INT32 cnt;
00651 
00652       if ( gsFadeRealCount != gsFadeCount )
00653       {
00654 
00655             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < ( gsFadeLimit - gsFadeCount ); cnt++ )
00656             {
00657                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRectUsingLowPercentTable( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );        
00658             }
00659 
00660             // Refresh Screen
00661             RefreshScreen( NULL );
00662 
00663             // Copy save buffer back
00664             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00665 
00666             gsFadeRealCount = gsFadeCount;
00667       }
00668 
00669 }

00671 
00672 BOOLEAN UpdateSaveBufferWithBackbuffer(void)
00673 {
00674       UINT32 uiDestPitchBYTES, uiSrcPitchBYTES;
00675       UINT8  *pDestBuf, *pSrcBuf;
00676       UINT16 usWidth, usHeight;
00677       UINT8  ubBitDepth;
00678 
00679   
00680       // Update saved buffer - do for the viewport size ony!
00681       GetCurrentVideoSettings( &usWidth, &usHeight, &ubBitDepth );
00682 
00683       pSrcBuf = LockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, &uiSrcPitchBYTES);
00684       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER, &uiDestPitchBYTES);
00685 
00686       if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00687       {
00688             // BLIT HERE
00689             Blt16BPPTo16BPP((UINT16 *)pDestBuf, uiDestPitchBYTES, 
00690                               (UINT16 *)pSrcBuf, uiSrcPitchBYTES,  
00691                               0, 0, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00692       }
00693 
00694       UnLockVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER);
00695       UnLockVideoSurface(guiSAVEBUFFER);
00696 
00697       return(TRUE);
00698 }
